rooms.name: Crash Landing
rooms.effect: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rooms.name: Goblin Camp
rooms.effect: Create a Treasure token.

rooms.name: Emerald Grove
rooms.effect: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.

rooms.name: Auntie's Teahouse
rooms.effect: Scry 3.

rooms.name: Defiled Temple
rooms.effect: You may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, draw a card.

rooms.name: Mountain Pass
rooms.effect: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

rooms.name: Ebonlake Grotto
rooms.effect: Create two 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying.

rooms.name: Grymforge
rooms.effect: For each opponent, goad up to one target creature that player controls.

rooms.name: Githyanki Crèche
rooms.effect: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among up to three target creatures you control.

rooms.name: Last Light Inn
rooms.effect: Draw two cards.

rooms.name: Reithwin Tollhouse
rooms.effect: Roll 2d4 and create that many Treasure tokens.

rooms.name: Moonrise Towers
rooms.effect: Instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost 3 less to cast.

rooms.name: Gauntlet of Shar
rooms.effect: Each opponent loses 5 life.

rooms.name: Balthazar's Lab
rooms.effect: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

rooms.name: Circus of the Last Days
rooms.effect: Create a token that’s a copy of one of your commanders, except it’s not legendary.

rooms.name: Undercity Ruins
rooms.effect: Create three 4/1 black Skeleton creature tokens with menace.

rooms.name: Steel Watch Foundry
rooms.effect: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.”

rooms.name: Ansur's Sanctum
rooms.effect: Reveal the top four cards of your library and put them into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to those cards’ total mana value.

rooms.effect: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rooms.effect: Target creature gets -4/-0 until your next turn.

rooms.name: Throne of the Dead Three
rooms.effect: Reaveal the top card of ten cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, then put three +1/+1 counters on it. It gains hexproof until your next turn. Then shuffle.
